sentences.en: A careless driver is a menace to all road users.
sentences.cn: 漫不经心的驾驶员对于路上所有车辆和行人都是危险的.

sentences.en: A man who drives fast is a menace to other people.
sentences.cn: 开快车的人对其他人是个威胁.

sentences.en: a new initiative aimed at beating the menace of illegal drugs
sentences.cn: 旨在打击非法毒品威胁的新举措

sentences.en: As I have said earlier in this book, bad shoes are a menace.
sentences.cn: 正如我在本书前面说过的那样，劣质的鞋子会很麻烦。

sentences.en: But gradually they came to see the menace to themselves.
sentences.cn: 但他们逐渐看出了自己面临的威胁.

sentences.en: He spoke with menace in his voice.

sentences.cn: 他带着威胁的口气讲话.

sentences.en: In my view you are a menace to the public.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，你对公众是个祸害。

sentences.en: The big hole outside the house is a menace to children's safety.
sentences.cn: 房子外面的大窟窿对孩子们的安全是个威胁.

sentences.en: The elephants are still menaced by poachers.
sentences.cn: 大象仍然面临非法捕猎者的威胁。

sentences.en: the growing menace of oil pollution at sea
sentences.cn: 日益严重的海洋石油污染

sentences.en: The man's worse than irritating, he's a positive menace!
sentences.cn: 这个人不只惹人生气, 简直是讨厌透了.

sentences.en: The whole air of menace was accentuated by the fact that he was so cordial and soft-voiced.
sentences.cn: 他如此亲切，说话轻声细语，这更加重了威胁的语气。

sentences.en: There is a pervading sense of menace.
sentences.cn: 有一种危机四伏的感觉。

sentences.en: There was menace in his voice.
This growing poverty in the midst of growing poverty constitutes a permanent menace to peace.
sentences.cn: 在这种不断增长的贫困中正在增长着的贫困,构成了对和平的永久的威胁.

sentences.en: Throughout the book there is a pervading sense of menace.
sentences.cn: 全书弥漫着一种危险的气息。

sentences.en: You're a menace to my privacy, Kenworthy.
sentences.cn: 肯沃西，你这人真讨厌，居然侵犯我的隐私。
